attributes.action: Investigate real reason for pay gap not just summary figures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The governments policies for dealing with the issue of the gender pay gap needs to take into account the real cause not just average and summary figures.

A investigation needs to take place to see if the Pay Gap is accross industry or within each industry.

For instance is the difference due to women and men working in different industies and the pay gap between these.  For instance high paid industries like IT are heavly male and lower paid like Teaching and retail banking are mainly female and this follows through from UNI and the number studying.
